sentences.en: Aldermen Sweater told Grinder that starvation was no excuse for dishonesty.
sentences.cn: 参议员斯韦特先生和格林德先生说,饥饿不能作为为非作歹的借口.

sentences.en: But in starvation ketone bodies replace glucose to an increasing extent.
sentences.cn: 但在饥饿期,酮体就越来越多地取代了葡萄糖.

sentences.en: Disease often follows ( on from ) starvation because the body is weakened.
sentences.cn: 疾病的产生往往是由于饥饿的缘故,这是因身体虚弱所致.

sentences.en: Disease often follows on starvation because the body is weakened.
sentences.cn: 疾病的产生往往是由于饥饿的缘故,因为身体很虚弱.

sentences.en: I was suffering from acute sunstroke, starvation and exhaustion.
In the towns of central Greece, starvation provided plenty of recruits.
sentences.cn: 在希腊中部城市, 饥荒促使大批人士参加了战斗.

sentences.en: Love never dies of starvation but often of indigestion.
sentences.cn: 恋爱决不至于因饿而死,而是多数因消化不良而死.

sentences.en: Millions of people are threatened with starvation as a result of drought and poor harvests.
sentences.cn: 几百万人因干旱和歉收而受到饥饿的威胁。

sentences.en: Prolonged starvation and aging might lead to rejuvenation of embryogenic potential.
sentences.cn: 长期的饥饿和衰老可以导致胚胎发生能力的复壮.

sentences.en: Relief workers say it's worse than ever as disease and starvation combine to kill thousands.
sentences.cn: 救灾人员说疾病加上饥饿夺去了数千人的生命，严重程度前所未有。

sentences.en: These people are living on the verge of starvation.
sentences.cn: 这些人正在饥饿线上挣扎.

sentences.en: Thissue wasting and weight loss are rapid in the initial stages of starvation.
sentences.cn: 体组织的损耗和体重的减低,在饥饿开始阶段,变化非常急剧.

sentences.en: We lived just on the borders of actual starvation.
sentences.cn: 实际上我们在饥饿的边缘上挣扎.
